title: T205's Austin Polar Bear and Olmstead Hassan

posts.post_title: T205's Austin Polar Bear and Olmstead Hassan
posts.post_content:
I have a couple of nice looking T205's available:
 
Austin Polar Bear, one wrinkle on the left edge, great color and registration.

Olmstead Hassan, very clean front and back.

$40 each delivered or $75 for the pair.

Scott
Price lowered again, who wants em?
